overview: Co-founded Netnote International in 1997 and held the role of Chief Operations Officer. Pat Oâ€™Donnell ran his own consultancy from 1996 to 1997, providing direction to companies in product development, strategic management and outsourcing. Between 1985 and 1996, he held a number of senior roles at Apple Computer Ltd. including: Outsourcing Business manager, Value engineering and development manager, Research and development project manager, and new products project manager. Prior to this, he has worked for a number of multinational companies in the High Tech sector. He is a graduate of University College Cork with a B.E. degree and an MBA.
